title: Kate Moss in the Sheer Dress and Statement Fur Jacket During London Fashion Week - Vogue

organizations.name: statement fur jacket during london fashion week - vogue kate moss

text: Kate Moss Has Found the Perfect Statement Jacket for Day or Night February 22, 2017 2:42 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM-GSI Kate Moss ’s winter coat game is unrivaled—from cheetah-trimmed tailored toppers to full-on leopard spots and even star-motif intarsia versions , the sartorially gifted model knows how to look cool while keeping warm. And last night in London, while attending her friend Edward Enninful’s party, Moss debuted yet another winning moment by marrying sheer ’70s-inspired dressing with OTT ’80s glamour. The cropped jacket featured a contrasting mash-up of sleek pony hair mixed with a cheetah motif, resulting in a more polished take on the Marc Jacobs biker jacket worn by Gigi Hadid during New York Fashion Week . But instead of the T-shirt, jeans, and biker boot combos that Moss often sports, she slipped into an ethereal floor-length dress, a slick alternative with a feminine twist. Amping up the effect were platform booties, while Moss’s tiny rope-handle evening bag carried all the essentials. In This Story: Kate Moss Recommended For You
